script.author: ARC-A
script.text: System Notification: Anomalous data packet detected. Source: Weather Station 34.2N, 12.8W. Time: 2077-03-15. Classification: Impossible.

script.author: Alana
script.text: ARC-A has found something

script.author: Jax
script.text: A corrupted error log, again?!?

script.author: Jax
script.text: A corrupted error log, again?!?

script.author: Alana
script.text: No Jax, this one looks different

script.author: ARC-A
script.text: ARC-A tell me why I should care

script.author: ARC-A
script.text: Summarising the anomalous data packet from, Weather Station 34.2N, 12.8W. Time: 2077-03-15. This data packet contains weather information from the weather station in precinct 743 close to the Sol-Fusion Lab before the alignment and...

script.author: Jax
script.text: ARC-A stop

script.author: Jax
script.text: OK I get it, no need to be so verbose

script.author: ARC-A
script.text: Updating preferences

script.author: Lena
script.text: Near the Sol-Fusion site

script.author: Lena
script.text: Finally, ARC-A has found data relate to a relevant location

script.author: Jax
script.text: It's such a tiny data package, is this really worth the effort?

script.author: Lena
script.text: I know, but the truth will be nestled in the smallest gap

script.author: Alana
script.text: It's a single, impossible data point from a 2077 weather report

script.author: Lena
script.text: The data stream has tried to bury the truth. But I'm confident it cannot be errased ðŸ¤ž

script.author: Lena
script.text: We will find a lead at some point, maybe this is it

script.author: Lena
script.text: It's a barometric pressure spike that would simply imply, for a few seconds. Luna had an atmosphere.

script.author: Lena
script.text: Rubbish! Thats just another piece of corrupted data ðŸ˜¡

script.author: Jax
script.text: I'm sick of looking through 10'000 lines of garbage error logs. I still don't get why this one is special

script.author: Lena
script.text: Sol-Fusion could have affected the weather and atmosphere, it's not that far fetched to hope this one is special

choices.text: We will investigate, it is a solid lead.
We haven't had any other leads in a long time, lets take a look
Jax's right. I'm tired, let's just discard it as system noise

script.author: Alana
script.text: We will investigate, it is a solid lead.

script.author: Jax
script.text: Fine, I'll use ARC-A's deep scan function for any related fringe data

script.author: Lena
script.text: ARC-A found a triad of data: relevant location, relevant time and plausible scientific anomaly

script.author: Jax
script.text: I get it, there is more to this error than meets the eye
